name: api_ui_CanvasGroup
description: A Canvas placable element that can be used to modify children Alpha, Raycasting, Enabled state.

properties.name: alpha
properties.description: Set the alpha of the group.

properties.name: blocksRaycasts
properties.description: Does this group block raycasting (allow collision).

properties.name: ignoreParentGroups
properties.description: Should the group ignore parent groups?

properties.name: interactable
properties.description: Is the group interactable (are the elements beneath the group enabled).
